attributes.action: Review the teaching of English Literature in schools so that it no longer discriminates against children with an Autistic Spectrum disorder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: English is taught in schools today with an emphasis on "empathy" - getting inside the characters on the page - whereas formerly the purpose was to discover and appreciate the methods used by the author. ASD children find empathising extremely difficult, and so fail to achieve their potential in English literature. It is time to return to how English literature used to be taught, and thus end this discrimination.
